name: FutureTech
description:
This game is made by Pixel Developers.

Story:

You are a robot in the year 2017 on a different planet. The humans did sent you

to protect the base on the planet. But as time goes on other robots come and

want to destroy the base. You need to kill all the robots and protect the base

until the year 4220 because then the humans arrive.

Controls:

PRESS Z to move forward

PRESS S to move backwards

PRESS D to move right

PRESS Q to move left

PRESS H to make a container (costs 75p)

PRESS J for healing (costs 100p)

PRESS the left mouse button to shoot

HOLD the left mouse button on a container to drag a container
